title: A Year Of Devastation And Tonnes Of Rubble To Deal With, Gaza's Struggle
content: The United Nations estimates there is over 42 million tonnes of debris, including both shattered edifices that are still standing and flattened buildings.
summary: The United Nations estimates there is over 42 million tonnes of debris, including both shattered edifices that are still standing and flattened buildings.

title: Israeli Airstrike On Mosque In Gaza Kills 26
content: The health ministry in Hamas-run Gaza said on Sunday an Israeli strike on a mosque-turned-shelter in central Deir al-Balah killed 26 people, while Israel's military said it had targeted Hamas militants.
summary: The health ministry in Hamas-run Gaza said on Sunday an Israeli strike on a mosque-turned-shelter in central Deir al-Balah killed 26 people, while Israel's military said it had targeted Hamas militants.

title: Three-decade Long Treasure Hunt For 'Golden Owl' Finally Over
content: A 31-year-long treasure hunt that attracted thousands of enthusiasts across France has come to an end.

title: "I Promise...": UK Woman Writes Letter To Daughter Held By Hamas In Gaza
content: The mother of a British woman, who was among those taken hostage by Hamas on October 7, has written a heartfelt letter to her daughter and urged UK Prime Minister Keir Starmer to ensure it's delivered in Gaza.
summary: The mother of a British woman, who was among those taken hostage by Hamas on October 7, has written a heartfelt letter to her daughter and urged UK Prime Minister Keir Starmer to ensure it's delivered in Gaza.

title: This Singapore Hotel Has Been Named As World's New Best Skyscraper

title: Inside Details Of How Israel's Mossad Worked Out Pager Idea: 5 Points

title: Emirates Airline Bans Pagers And Walkie-Talkies Amid Hezbollah Attacks
content: Dubai's Emirates airline has implemented a ban on pagers and walkie-talkies on its flights, responding to recent attacks linked to the Lebanese militant group Hezbollah.

title: Is It A Beginning Of #MeToo Movement In Music Industry?
content: The music industry has long evaded a #MeToo reckoning like that experienced in Hollywood or the media, but the blockbuster charges against hip hop magnate Sean Combs could finally prove an inflection point.

title: Opinion: You Got An iPhone, Now Think Of 'Envy Imperialism'

title: Too Hot For Beach Visit? Dubai's Floodlit Beaches Are A Hit At Night

title: US Man Sets Himself On Fire, Thousands March To Mark Israel-Hamas War Anniversary
content: Thousands marched in US cities from Washington to Los Angeles on Saturday, demanding an immediate ceasefire as the war in Gaza nears the one-year mark, with a man attempting to self-immolate in protest.

title: Donald Trump's "Guts" Bring Him Back To The Site Of Failed Assassination
content: Supporters knelt and others bowed their heads as Donald Trump led a moment of silence at 6:11 pm, the time when shots rang out at a rally in the same rural Pennsylvania showground exactly 12 weeks earlier.
summary: Supporters knelt and others bowed their heads as Donald Trump led a moment of silence at 6:11 pm, the time when shots rang out at a rally in the same rural Pennsylvania showground exactly 12 weeks earlier.
